code: export let TaskType=/*#__PURE__*/function(TaskType){TaskType["HEADS"]="Heads";TaskType["TAILS"]="Tails";return TaskType;}({});export let TaskStatus=/*#__PURE__*/function(TaskStatus){TaskStatus["PENDING"]="Pending";TaskStatus["IN_PROGRESS"]="In Progress";TaskStatus["COMPLETED"]="Completed";return TaskStatus;}({});export let PlayerStatus=/*#__PURE__*/function(PlayerStatus){PlayerStatus["WAITING"]="Waiting";PlayerStatus["ACTIVE"]="Active";PlayerStatus["IDLE"]="Idle";return PlayerStatus;}({});
